name: [THE] unfinished game
description:
This is an unfinished game.
 that ends as soon as you start the game.

Even the developer doesn't recommend you to play.

Our team is doomed. I couldn't get a team member. No art, no voice actors. So this is the game that came out.

Easter egg has prepared a lot.
But don't play.

If you press M, something might come out?
But don't do that.

developed by : Scincy,  Ev_Nyang
